content.detailedDescription:
Myself, my 31 year old daughter and 5 month old baby grandson were headed to early, texas which is near brownwood, texas. i was the driver and my daughter and baby grandson were in the backseat. as we were traveling through mullins, texas i noticed these flashing amber colored lights (the lights were flashing in a line one after the other and flashing horizontally), and i told my daughter to look and as she was trying to look (through the front windshield) the flashing lights disappeared, just about maybe 15 to 30 seconds later i again saw the flashing lights out through my driver's side window, and i told my daughter to look and the second time she did see the flashing lights in the sky. we were still driving through mullins, texas at that time, and i continued to keep an eye on the flashing lights and my speed was slower than the speed limit. when i first noticed the flashing lights which did get my attention, i had no idea what my daughter and i were looking at because in my 50 years of life, i have never seen or witnessed this before nor had my daughter of 31 years of life. we had no idea what we were looking at. and i told her, i believe it is a ufo. my reaction was, to be honest, i was afraid. after the flashing stopped maybe after a couple of minutes, i then saw only 2 solid lights (like headlights) and i swear the lights were headed towards us, and i then started to drive faster because i did not want this, whatever it was, over us and i was beginning to feel more afraid. i could still see the 2 solid lights through my driver's side window and then the lights disappeared, it seemed to have "poofed" into thin air. there was no trace of anything as if we were just looking at a clear sky. my daughter and i were very startled! we couldn't see an object because the flashing lights were so bright. i did make sure to look at the clock and it was 7:55pm. i did have a cell phone with a camera, but i was so startled that i didn't even thinking about taking a picture. my daughter did not have her camera with her. i would like to know if anyone else had witnessed this and maybe called this sighting in. my daughter & i would like to know what she & i were looking at. 

thank you,
*(wit's name removed--cms/sg).
content.summary: I could only see flashing amber colored lights, in a horizontal line.

content.detailedDescription: 5 very faint star-like objects at daylight.  converging together.  turned their lights off and disappeared from sight.  movement - very slow but steady,  if not directly observed not ever seen.
content.summary: 5 star-like objects emerging together

content.detailedDescription:
This is response to the person in mo. who saw the large orange object.
i saw the very same thing in san angelo texas on 10/10/10 sunday at 8:30pm. it was very bright orange and pulsating. it was about 900 ft above my  house. it went over my house and my neighbor's house behind my house. it did not make a sound at all. this was not a plane, helicopter, or balloon. it flew from the south heading north. this was the strangiest thing i have ever seen. i wonder what this was?
content.summary: Large orange pulsating object

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were sitting outside drinking hot chocolate, and we were looking at the stars. she noticed that there were colorful lights flashing in the sky. at first, i thought it was a plane, but then it just shot off really fast. then, we saw another one just staying in the same spot for a duration of about 30 minutes. it would occasionally just shot a couple of feet in different directions.It would flash colors of blue, green, pink, and red. i kept looking around and i noticed that six of them went all in the same direction within a five minute time period. a few minutes later, one caame really fast shotting right over us, then slowing down. i do belive that this sighting was a ufo.
content.summary: Flashing colorful lights in sky shooting..

content.detailedDescription: Walking my daughter's dog and facing north in her complex parking lot. it was partly cloudy with large clear spots. i saw a bright light slightly nw, at about 11:00 and about 60 degrees above the horizon. it appeared to be still and i assumed it was a bright star.  as looked i at it, an airplane approached from behind the light, slightly  to it's right ( east ) and began to overtake it...I cannot estimate the altitude of either or the distance between them.  visually the plane seemed between 1 to 2 inches east of the light. as the plane approched from behind, the light began to move in the same direction as the plane, toward me.  the plane overtook and passed the light which was now steadily moving in the same direction as the plane. the plane was clearly a passenger plane, noise lights etc it passed overhead. it was followed by the lght which, by the time it reached my position,  was now clearly 4 white lights... two at the front, two at the back, like auto headlights. toward the rear was a smaller red flickering light between the two rear white lights. it continued flying south easterly, like the plane but at a slower pace. it made no sound nor could i see a structure of any kind, i have assumed a rectangle by virtue of the position of the 4 white lights.  i think the length appeared about half that of the airplane, but i have no idea how close thy were to each other,  so this is just a guess. i watched the light(s0 until the disappeared in cloud cover.
content.summary: See below

content.detailedDescription: About a week ago, this exact event happened. however, it reoccurred today. my mother spotted the same star-like flashing object once again, so my friend and i rushed outside. we sat outside on my back porch watching this object for about thirty minutes before we realized six other round objects with orange lights around its' circular perimeter all going in the same direction within a five minute time period. after that, we got some binoculars and stared at the object. however, since it was dark we could not make out the exact shape; the bottom portion was circular, but appeared eggish because of the angle. there were about four different colored lights, being pink,blue,green and red. this was the largest and most important ufo which hovered in one spot, then would shoot off very fast for a very small distance. then, after seeing the colors we noticed a closer ufo that seemed to glide right over us. this one had the same placement of lights, however they were not multi-colored. this had us very nervous as it was way too low down for an airplane to fly. we had my dad come outside to see if he could tell what it was, since he was an ex-marine and knows the types of military planes or helicopters that could resemble it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw a very very bright star like object. then it started flashing multiple colors. got the binoculars and found out it was circular with multicolored lights on the undercarriage.

content.detailedDescription: The first night i witnessed one of these crafts was roughly two months ago. my mother and i were outside and i was leaving. a bright red orb slowly hovered over the woods across the street. i turned and looked at her to see her in shock. we had both seen the same thing. my next encounter was on my way back to my girlfriends town house where i currently reside. i witnessed the same red object only this time it was following me. it disappeared after about ten minutes. when i first witnessed witnessed these object i thought that they were some form of heat lightning. since the night of october 14 i have been up late for work. i sit in a living room overlooking a vast range of the appalachian mountains. at first i started seeing a few lights at a time blinking irradicaly. i thought that they were planes until taking a better look. i had a feeling as if i was being watched and i ended up staying up the entire night. from that night on i have seen them every where in this county and i even contacted local authorities. they assumed that i was just seeing things and that they were most likely helicopters. the night of the 16 i was on my way home when i came up on a single police car and i saw a minor wreck. this is after i tried driving though the mountains to find one these crafts i saw from a distance. i stopped as the officer dealt with the civilians and then i saw a glimmer. there were two orbs 20 feet down from the officer moving in ways i have never seen before. i filmed it all with my camera and jumped back in my car overwhelmed with fear. within ten minutes the area was completely shutdown with law enforcement every where. for the next two nights i witnessed these crafts in the mountains and floating above. i have pictures of them moving in ways that defy physical laws of this earth. i decided to come forward with this information after last night...I had been filming them for the third time at a scenic view here west virginia. this night was different as i heard odd pulsating noises. i got scared for my life and left immediately. that night i woke up at 3 am and felt as if i was being watched. i saw these lights again from my window and took my camera out and began rolling film. the first thing that scared me to death was the moon had a red holographic image coming from the side that i have never witnessed before. i filmed this as well as the lights blinking and lighting up forming a triangle. one of the objects actually came down and sat hovering pulsating lights. i have no desire to make these events up and i am a man of my word. i have roughly 8 hours of film all together and about 200 pictures. i believe this event will change everything.
content.shape: Bullet,   Missile,   Cigar,   Cone,   Circle,   Cylinder,   Diamond,   Disc,   Egg,   Fireball,   Sphere,   Square,   Rectagular,   Star-like,   Teardrop,   Triangle,   Unknown
content.summary: Ball/blinking lights/pulsating cigar shape

content.detailedDescription:
Me, my wife and her friend, *(name deleted--cms/sg), from houston, tx had driven from murphy, nc over to eat at the dillard house in dillard, ga. after we had eaten our meal *(name deleted) went back onto the porch of the restaurant to take a few pictures while me and my wife waited in the truck. after *(name deleted) finished taking her pictures we left dillard and did a few other things and then drove back to murphy, nc. we got hom about 6:30pm est. i then asked *(name deleted) for her camera card so i could download the pictures she took during the day, including the two that are attached. after downloading the pictures to my laptop we started looking at them. these two pictures were the last (2) and we were certainly surprised to see this object in the sky. *(name deleted) did not notice anything while she took the pictures and it wasn't until we loaded the pictures onto the pc did we see anything. it did make the hair on my arms stand up! *(name deleted) said she did see the object  on the way to the dillard house (she thinks it was on the way but isn't sure) but she didn't say anything at that time. i asked her why didn't she say something to me but she said she didn't think anything of it at that time and thought it was probably an airplane.  

i am a mufon member but *(name deleted) isn't and she didn't know i was a member until just now. for me to finally see my first ufo is certainly exciting. if it can be explained away as something else, well, that is ok, too.

after all these many years of seeing nothing in the skies, gives me a much better understanding how other folks must feel when they see something out of the ordinary.

please feel free to contact me. perhaps other folks saw the object and reported it to the dillard police. 

please keep me posted. if you need me to keep the camera , kodak easyshare c633, i need to know this right away as *(name deleted) leaves for texas on sunday. 

regards,  **(wit's name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Taking a picture of mountains and fall colors.

content.detailedDescription: On july 31 2010 my daughter was returning from an errand when she saw a bright light slowly drifting towards our home on dover center rd in westlake, ohio from the south moving north. she phoned me and told me to go outside and see if i could see the light in the sky. i did and and saw a extremely bright white light slowly moving right towards our house. the light on the object was so bright that it actually projected a beam of light in front of it. it was hard to discern a shape other than a round sphere. there was absolutely no sound or flashing lights. the light was fairly low in altitude and i strained to try to understand what i was seeing. my daughter arrived within 20 secs. after she had called me and we both stood there in amazement. cars continued down dover center which is a fairly busy north south road with no one seemingly taking notice. i went in the house and got my digital camera and binoculars and ran back out. i told my daughter to start taking pictures and i looked through the binoculars. to my astonishment i saw that the bright white light was actually 5 lights in the shape of an x and i saw a faint triangular outline around the lights. at this point i couldn't believe my eyes because the object released a stream of what i call ejecta. this ejecta appeared to be a golden brown line coming straight down out of the lights. on either side of this stream sparks jumped out on both sides, it was crazy. my daughter saw the same thing without even using the binoculars. the object passed behind a large tree out of sight. we jumped into her car which was still running and headed north in the direction it was heading. when we got to a clearing about 1/4 mi. down the road we couldn't find it anywhere. we drove around for about 15 mins. figuring we'd surely hear some sirens or commotion because of the ejecta falling on something or someone. again nothing.My daughter and i went back home because she wanted to tell her boyfriend what happened. i got in my car and drove around in bay village until i flagged down a police officer and told him what i saw and asked if he had heard any thing over his radio. he told me that he had not. two days later i went to the westlake police dept. and asked them if anyone had reported lights friday night and was informed no one had . unfortunately, the digital pictures we had taken only showed a red dot with a black background because at the time it was too far away. although this happened a few months ago this is still intriguing us and we wanted to share our story with someone who may have experienced the same type of encounter.
content.summary: My daughter phoned me to go outside to see a bright light which she could not identify.

content.detailedDescription:
While staying in playa del carmen, my friend *(name removed--cms/sg) and i went to our roof top to see the night sky and look for shooting stars.  it was a beautifuly clear night no clouds and bright stars.
while watching the sky, we both noticed what we assumed to be a jet plane coming from the east , from over the ocean and moving west, towards land and us.  we did not mention it to each other but we were both watching it to the point when it was almost directly above .There was no sound and  i remember it not moving in a perfectly straight line but meandering somewhat  within its course.  it had blinking colored lights and possibly a white light.  then in an instant, it disappeared.  it was no where to be found. no lights or shape of anything. we looked all over the sky for at least 15 minutes or so.  it should have been right above us with no clouds or anything to obscure our sight.
it simply vanished.
about 5 minutes later we saw two jet planes pass in a similar direction that seemed to be unusually close to each other on their flight path.  they passed the entire visible sky in normal fashion. 

when first seeing the object, it caught my attention a little more than normal.  just seemed to be moving so quietly and as i remember, the only object moving in the sky. 
for it to completly vanish has *(name removed--cms/sg) and i wondering what it was.  i asked two airline pilots of our flight home if they ever shut their lights and they said no. just the landing light when high in flight.
the were stumped also.
content.summary: blinking lights that appeared to be a jet airliner then dissapeared

content.detailedDescription: I was at a middle school football game when me and a few other people noticed the slowly moving triangle move over us with only a little hum of noise. as it moved over the school and out of our veiw i stood up to follow it when a small blue/gray puff of smoke swirled out of the back and over the object. it had 3 lights at each point, not blinking just solid light and a another smaller light in the middle. the object made no sudden movements, it just moved foward slowly.When i saw it i first thought it was tr3b but i thought the lights were far to small and bright to be a tr3b.
content.summary: Black low flying triangle, cny

content.detailedDescription: I photographed several shots of the moon on 10/21/2010, but this one seems to show something either flying around it or a extremely large crater. i really can't figure out what it is. just wanted to share the photo. if you download the photo. try changing the contrast to see if you can get a better picture.
content.summary: Was taking pictures of the moon and saw this

content.detailedDescription: My roommate and i were heading down i-5 (south) and we were a few miles before grants pass heading up a relatively steep hill when i noticed some brilliantly white lights above/near the peek of the hill.  at first we only saw 2 bright lights because of our angle of approach, but as we got further up the hill we could see that there were 3 white lights in a triangular shape and one blinking amber(ish) colored light in the center.  we kept driving up the hill discussing what it could be, and decided that it was definitely not any sort of normal plane because it was totally still and looked to be very large.  as we drove underneath it my roommate put his head out the window and looked up and said he could barely see the outline of the object and that it was a triangle with the lights in the corners.  i couldnt make out the outline because i couldnt stick my head out the window to look up while driving.  it was difficult to tell the size of this thing without much to reference it to, but just judging by how long it took to drive underneath this thing and just our perspective of it i would say it was maybe the width of a football field or so.  as we went down the other side of the hill my roommate said it must have moved toward the way we came from because we quickly lost sight of it with the peak of the hill obstructing our view.  if we could have turned around at that point on the freeway we definitely would have, but we were in a bit of a rush and there wasn't any way to go back the other way for a few miles. ive seen ufo's a couple times before but they were the single bright lights that move in zig-zag patterns, and i never quite believed in the triangular ufo's before this sighting.  i obviously believe in them now...
content.summary: Huge black triangle with brilliantly bright lights on each corner and one blinking amber light in center hovering just over i-5

content.detailedDescription: I saw a fireball-like/glowing object north of me as i was coming home around 8:30 pm. it definitely stood out; however, i was only able to see it for about 15 seconds until i went down a hill and couldn't see it any longer. from my estimation, it would have been somewhere north of 23rd st east of sterling. i just noticed from another report that someone else saw the same thing in independence last night.
content.summary: Saw same thing in independence, mo

content.detailedDescription:
For two months prior to this event, i had been seeing a strang object in the sky to the south sometimes and sometimes to the west of my home.  this usually occured around 9 to 10 o'clock at night.  the object gave off many different colors and at times gold beams would come from the bottom of it to the ground. i tried to submit a report to mufon at that time but i guess i did not do it correctly because nothing was logged about it on the site that i could find.
about the 9th of january my girl friend and i were coming back from hunting at about 10 at night and as we traveled west on the hwy 190, i was telling her about the object i had been seeing.  right cue it appeared directly in front of us in the western sky.  i told her to look that that was the thing i had been seeing.  she was looking at it with me and we were wondering what it could be, natural or ufo or man made, when from the north i spotted another one comeing at a high rate of speed.  the one in the west never moved.  the one from the north came up to the stationaly one circled it and placed itself next to it and became stationaly also.  the two were identical.  after about 4 or 5 minutes the one that had come from the north started to go up and toward the west.  when it was just about out of sight, it turned and came back east and passed directly over us at a very high altitude.  the one in the west remained stationary and was still there when i reached my home.  i tried to see it agian about 30 minutes after getting home but it was gone.  i have seen it again to the south, and to the west of my home on two occasions.  but, it has not been seen since april or may.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: T shaped ufo hovering in the western sky was approached by another.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog in our neighborhood and glanced at the southeastern sky where i have seen unexplained star-like objects several times.  i thought i was seeing an airplane with sunlight reflecting off it, because of the pale orange color, but before i had time to see if it was moving, it disappeared.  there were no clouds in the sky in that area.  i have seen one or two similar objects in the same place on three other occasions in the past month:  at dusk, two bright stars to the right of jupiter that disappeared within a few seconds of spotting them; one star at dusk; and one other sighting in early morning.  they don't seem to be moving and resemble a bright star or planet, a bit smaller and brighter than jupiter.  the first time i saw this, i assumed i was seeing a plane go behind a cloud (even though there were no noticeable clouds) and i watched to see if it would reappear, but it didn't.  i'm watching that part of the sky now, especially after so many similar reports from around the country.
content.summary: Bright star-like object in southeastern sky that disappeared as i watched

content.detailedDescription:
Stepped out to empty trash. noticed super bright star, venus or whatever in the evening sky. i froze in my tracks when it seemed to vibrate. i threw the trash bag at our front window to get my wife's attention...She didn't respond. i didn't want to lose sight of what i was seening, i just stood there. my 12 year old son came out the front door at that moment, asked what the heck i was doing...I told him to get my binoculars. as i looked at what i was certain was a planet...A starlike object moving from that particular point started moving east. it was much smaller than the bright star. however, it was soon being chased by another star that crossed it's path, now somewhat directly overhead. i gave the glassed to my son, and he too saw this happening. very high, it seemed. no exhaust, no noise...And no blinking lights associated with them whatsoever. total of about 3 or more starlike objects involved. the went off to the east. i've brought this up to people here and there with the expected responses.
last night i watched a program about ufo's over edwards. this event took place in littlerock california....About 25 miles south of that base. i've been looking ever since...And have to date not seen an episode like that again. i do see lots of planes, satelites, space shuttle landings, fighter planes maneuvering with each other in the foothills, all that stuff around here....Not even close!
content.summary: Stars chasing each other...Changing direction, crossing each other  very high. got binoculars, amazing what was going on.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving to work down lawrenceville hwy.  i am always looking up in the sky.  i saw this bright object in the sky.  it was huge.  i kept looking at it.  "what is that?" i thought it could be an air plane.  but it was sitting still.  maybe it could be a blimp.  but it was all lit up.  all of it was glowing.   the thing did not move. just sat in the sky.  i had to stop at a light and the object was in between 2 trees.  i looked to see if it moved behind a tree.  no.  it was still.  i stared hard trying to see what it was.
it seemed to glow.  it was white or silver.  there were lights flickering on an off or jumping around on the bottom of it.  i saw one red light on top.  the thing scared me so bad. i thought surely other people were seeing it.  i even turned on the am news radio to see if they were talking about it.  no.   i wish i could have driven toward it to get a better view.  but i had to get to work.  i slowly drove away from it until i could no longer see it's glow.  it is the strangest thing i've ever seen.  i told a friend at work.   she said she saw the same thing as she came off the interstate ramp.  i checked the news that night if anyone reported seeing anything.  i even checked the next day.  nothing.  so i decided to report it myself.  i haven't been able to stop thinking about it.  even during the event.
i was trembling.  i think i finally saw a space ship.
content.summary: I saw a glowing oval object with blue, yellow, red lights on bottom and a red light on top.

content.detailedDescription:
This report is being submitted on behalf the witness, at his request, by  *(name deleted--cms/sg).

10/22/10-received call from witnes who had obtained my phone number from **name deleted--cms/sg.  witness reported seeing a ufo in the northern sky, approximately 300 feet over the tree line, nearly every night for the last two months.  he stated that what he saw was boomerang shaped and yellow in color.  on one occassion he noticed a rotating red light under the yellow light.  the sighting occur usually about 7:15 or so each evening, however as time has progressed they have come later.  the object is now visible after 8:00 and remains so until dawn.  he stated that it is not visible if it is raining, but he has observed it on cloudy nights..
content.summary: Light(s) seen in northern sky almost nightly since approx july 2010

content.detailedDescription: I was driving west on 23rd street just a few blocks east of sterling in independence, when a light caught my eye just to the north of me.  it was a very large elongated fireball with no defined edges, and was traveling from south to north.  the object was moving very slowly, and appeared to be about 200 feet up and two blocks away from my position.  i pulled over to the side of the road to observe it, but did not follow it because i was a little bit afraid of what it might be.  i didn't have my camera with me.  the color was dark orange in the front part, and lighter orange in the back.  it was the size of two thumbnails put together. i watched until it went out of sight, which took about 10 minutes. i've never seen anything like this and am still quite shaken up by it. i'd like to know if anyone else has seen anything like it.
content.summary: Large orange glowing object moves slowly over independence, mo

content.detailedDescription:
Everything is exactly the way i stated in the prior report, but after seeing other reports... especially the one from missouri who had a diagram of exactly what i saw minus one "star".... they were all calling it jupiter... i just wanted to clarify that my "north star" could have been jupiter. diagram below....

(moon)
o 
    *(jupiter)  * (uknown) 
                * (unknown)
content.summary: Addendum to original report 10/21/10

content.detailedDescription: on october 22 around 530 ish i was drinking coffee and star watching. i was sitting down and facing northeast towards greensboro.  last night i saw several shooting stars and i was absently scanning the sky looking for more while planning my day.  i focused on a trio of bright stars and one winked out.  i kept my eye on it thinking that a cloud had covered it and it would reappear. it did reappear but significantly to the left of where it was originally. after a few seconds it winked out again, then reappeared in a different position.  i was awestruck and literally staring with my mouth hanging open.  after this it stayed put and pulsed out a very bright white light. after about 30 seconds it winked off again.  i started to scan the sky nearby to see if it would reappear and in my periphal vision to the left i glimpsed something moving at a great amount of speed.  i sat waiting to see something else for about 10 minites, then returned to the house.  i was shocked even though i've always hoped to see something anomalous.  a weird mixture of elation and puzzlement.
content.summary: Saw a star like object blink on/off then disappear

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down hwy 70 in mcewen tn. i noticed a bright object in the sky that looked alot like a star. this object was not moving as if just hovering really high. i watched it for about 3 minutes and it just disappeared. i thought at first it might have been an airplane that the sun was casting a reflection off of, but then i noticed 1. it wasn't moving, and 2. it was between me and the sun. all i could think was what the heck is that. i lost sight of the object as it looked as if it just disappeared.
content.summary: Starlike object in sky. not moving.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband first saw it at 7:30am from a window in our house, but by the time we got the good camera it was too late.  he was disappointed.  he described it as chrome-like with red and yellow on it.  sorta cigar shaped and keeping up with a plane

i went to the park down the street at 8:00 with dog and cheap camera because he was holding on to the good one just in case it came back; and at 8:30 it was moving slowly over the park!  i had crapy camera on me just in case but i did get 3 photos! not the best photos but i have something.

all i can say is that it behaved like mercury.  it was chrome like and would be circular but then move into an oval.  the object was rolling one way then another.  this one also had red on it but because it would change jesture i cant say that the red stayed on just one area of the ufo.  i will go back to the park at 9:30 and hopefully there is a pattern.  i will post pics later

another observation is that it looked like the birds were flying eractly.  at one point this morning around 7:40  we saw them flying into eachother.  they looks confused and paniced.

i was excited.  i waved to it in hopes that it would just stop crusing by.  i pointed to it and yelled ufo and got out crapy camera in the meantime the other three dog park people began to look and point.
content.summary: Chrome like but with red.  moved slowly

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside on my deck.
i allways look up at the sky aroung me from my deck to appreciate the morning surroundings. to the right of my deck up in the sky i saw 2 blinking lights move side to side what at first looked like against each other, and i was astounded, because i see airplanes all the time coming in to the airport . then i noticed a large streack in the sky associated with the left blinking light, but not the other blinking light on the right. it looked as if the right blinking light was hitting the left light. this occured for several seconds and then both lights disappeared. the large streak in the sky was still there. i called upstairs for a family member to come downstairs and showed them the streak in the sky and described what happened. that person agreed it did not look like a normal size streak from any aircraft we usually see flying over the skies where we live. about a few minutes later the large streak was in the sky to the left of the sky off our deck. i'm guessing from the earth's rotation. i took pictures on my camcorder of the streak because i could not find my camera.
content.summary: Blinking white lights  2 of them

content.detailedDescription: My family and friends were outside looking at the stars and the brightness of the moon. as we were looking at one star this is always bright out of no where two very bright lights appeared close to the one star we were looking at.The two lights were about 500 ft apart but connected to each other. we all starting saying where did those lights come from and they are so bright.Then about 2 mins later they begin to fade on and off and then disappeared.I have experienced many many strange events in the sky over my house. my friends and family have witnessed with me at least 50 or more strange sightings. they all say my house is the hot spot for ufo events.I have videos tapes of several sightings. there are always objects floating in the sky that do not carry any noise they just have red lights and white lights very bright lights they go on and off they appeared then disappear.
content.summary: Two white bright lights appeared then faded

content.detailedDescription:
I went out for my morning cigarette, and noticed that the sky above was perfectly clear. since the sun had not yet risen, i took a moment to marvel at how beautiful the star filled sky was. after looking north to locate the big dipper, i turned to look at orion. while scanning upward, i saw two stars that appeared to move a bit. my first thought was, "that can't be right." i watched the two stars more closely, and in fact, they were moving slowly across the sky in a southerly direction. first i tried to figure out why two aircraft would be flying a formation that open, and how they could maintain such a precise separation in a formation that loose. after i figured out that what i know about aircraft just didn't fit what i was watching, i thought that it might be possible that the lights two pointss on a single object. i selected a relatively brite star that the trajectory went near and attempted to move so that the lights would pass on either side of it, relative to my possition. unfortunately, i could not move far enough to get that angle, so i settled for picking a dimmer star that was directly in the path of the lights, and would have each pssing on either side. as i watched them move accross the star i picked, it was obscured btween them. the lights then passed out of sight beyond the tree line.
it is difficult to say how high the object was, but it was far enough that moving a distance of about 80 to 100 feet made no significant change in the apparent angle relative to the stars. there may have been a third light, equidistant between the two and slightly forward of them, but the moment that i thought i saw it was so fleeting that i am hesitant to state with any certainty that there was really one there. from the point at which i noticed the lights until they went beyond the trees was two minutes or less. they travelled roughly 35 or 40 degrees of arc across the sky in that time.
the time of sighting above is plus or minus about two minutes. if any other reports are received for this time frame i would like to know.
content.summary: Spotted two points of light that moved parallel to each other in a southerly direction

content.detailedDescription: i went out on my deck at 8:00pm and began to observe the moon in relation to jupiter. i noticed two stars at an even distance to jupiter, as if there were three stars lined up at equal distance. i closely watched these to stars and it seemed they were moving ever so little that i stood there watching for a few min., before i was certain they were not stars. at the moment i concluded this, the two star like objects turn at a 45 deg. angle, pass below jupiter and as the last star passed jupiter, they stopped and slowly faded to a red, then dissipated.
content.summary: Two star like objects moving in unison across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting on couch talking to a friend by phone while looking at the door with glass window when a golf ball looking light very bright pops up and is followed by 3 more in a perfect sequence; like the lights are being turned on one at a time. lights were coming forward as they came on in perfect sequence with the fourth one a little more forward than the other 3 that were evenly spaced. once they came on the lights did not move. then they all went off at the exact same time. i got up and went out the door telling my friend what i was seeing as the 2nd, 3rd and 4th lights were coming on. i told her what i was seeing was very strange. i stepped out on the deck of house as the 3rd and 4th lights came on. the moon was full with a planet in conjunction to the south of the moon almost above my head. there was no sounds, no breeze, and the night was cool. the lights were southeast and about 45 degrees off the horizon. the event lasted no more than 1 minute. my friend quickly noted the time for me as 9:40 pm eastern. after the lights went out there appeared to be a small plane with a red light moving from the southwest to the southeast which crossed over the area where the lights had gone out. the plane proceeded to the east and disappeared in the distance. the white lights were a lot larger than the red light on the plane as that red light was about the size of a ink pen tip and the white lights were as large as a pencil eraser if held at arms length. the lights were perfectly round like golf balls and the roundness was very pronounced.The lights did not have a star shine halo; instead they were perfectly round like a flash light turning on and then turning off.
i continued to talk to my friend on the phone while walking on my deck and trying to see if anything else seemed unusual. sky was clear without clouds and very light outside due to the full moon. no other lights appeared and about 10 minutes later i went back inside still talking on the phone to my friend. hanging up the phone i then explained to my husband watching tv what i had witnessed. he had seen me get up saying to my friend about the lights and had watched as i went on the deck to observe them closer. he is handicapped and did not attempt to get up and get into his wheelchair but waited to have me tell him what i had seen.
content.summary: Golf ball size lights come on in sky in a forward  arc like sequence and then all go out  together

content.detailedDescription: On my way to work my family and myself saw 3 bright white lights in an arched line. lights remained stationary for at least 10 min. on the way out of town we observed a 4th light that was a plane flying near the objects.
content.summary: 3 bright  stationary lights in formation
